title: Help identify a font / 'Canterbury': handtooled serif
content: Hi, I'm looking for help in identifying a font, Ive attached a pic from the company logo. Any help will be greatly appreciated!
author: osheausa

comments.content:
That picture is absolutely gorgeous!

Where is it?

I made a long search in my HD and on the web, and found nothing.  
Maybe it's not a font but a modified design from something like Trajan.
